marvinvr/docktail

Exposes Docker containers as Tailscale services

Related repos

  • Tools for managing Docker Compose, configs, and scheduled tasks for self-hosters
  • Docker management interface built with Tauri and Rust
  • Dashboard with service integrations and docker discovery
  • terminal UI for managing Docker containers, inspired by k9s
  • Terminal interface for Docker setup and app management
  • Manager for docker compose stacks
  • Runs a Tailscale node inside Caddy
